p: The title compound was synthesized by combining N-{3-[3-(2-chloro-4-pyrimidinyl)pyrazolo[1,5- a]pyridin-2-yl]phenyl}-2,6-difluorobenzamide (200 mg, 0.43 mmol) (prepared according to a procedure similar to that described in Example 27, Step C), N-(5-amino-2,3-dihydro-1 H-inden-2-yl)-2,2,2-trifluoroacetamide (127 mg, 0.52 mmol), hydrochloric acid (0.043 mmol, 43 µL 1 M HCl/diethylether) and 2 mL isopropanol in a sealed vessel. The vial and contents were heated in a microwave synthesizer at 180 °C for 30 min. The reaction was cooled and concentrated. The residue was partitioned between EtOAc and saturated NaHCO 3. The organic was washed with brine, dried with MgSO 4 and concentrated. The crude material was purified by silica gel column chromatography (0 - 100% gradient; (90% DCM:9% MeOH:1 % NH 4OH/DCM)). Purification provided 278 mg (95%) of the coupled adduct. ESIMS (M+H)+ = 684.20.
